      Checks whether the password contains at least one character from the username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username string
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least one character from the username, false otherwise

    • isBalancedPassword

      public boolean isBalancedPassword()
      Checks whether the password has balanced parentheses.
      Returns:
      true if the password has balanced parentheses, false otherwise

    • isPalindromePossible

      public boolean isPalindromePossible(int index)
      Checks whether it is possible to obtain a palindrome from the password.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the last character in the alphabet
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to obtain a palindrome from the password, false otherwise

    • removeBracketsAndLowerCase

      public String removeBracketsAndLowerCase()
      Removes all brackets and converts all characters to lowercase in the password. Time complexity: O(n)
      Returns:
      the password without brackets and in lowercase

    • addNumberOfLetter

      public void addNumberOfLetter(String dummy, int[] arr)
      Counts the number of occurrences of each letter in the given string and stores them in an array. Time complexity: O(n)
      Parameters:
      dummy - the string to count the letters
      arr - the array to store the counts

    • sizeControl

      public boolean sizeControl()
      Checks if the password length is at least 8 characters. Time complexity: O(1)
      Returns:
      true if the password length is at least 8 characters, false otherwise

    • bracketControl

      public boolean bracketControl()
      Checks if the password contains at least 2 brackets. Time complexity: O(n)
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least 2 brackets, false otherwise

    • justLatterAndBracketControl

      public boolean justLatterAndBracketControl()
      Checks if the password contains only letters and brackets. Time complexity: O(n)
      Returns:
      true if the password contains only letters and brackets, false otherwise
